hadiths.text: Jabir (Allah be pleased with him) reported:I heard Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) say: It is not permissible for any one of you to carry weapons in Mecca

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ حَمْلِ السِّلاَحِ، بِمَكَّةَ بِلاَ حَاجَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of carrying weapons in Makkah when there is no need for that
